name: beta-portworx-tensorflow
preInstallNotes:
This is a community package. Community packages are unverified and unreviewed content from the community.

Default configuration requires 3 agent nodes each with: CPU: 2.0 | Memory: 8192 MB

More specifically, each instance type requires:

Parameter server: 2 instances | 1.0 CPU | 4096 MB MEM

Worker: 3 instances | 1.0 CPU | 4096 MB MEM

GPU worker: No instances by default | 1 GPU | 1.0 CPU | 4096 MB MEM

Tensorboard: No instances by default | 1.0 CPU | 4096 MB MEM.

Portworx should be installed on the DC/OS private agents in order to provision portworx volumes for this framework.
postInstallNotes:
The DC/OS TensorFlow service is being installed!

	Issues: support@portworx.com
postUninstallNotes:
The DC/OS TensorFlow service is being uninstalled.

For DC/OS versions from 1.10 no further action is required.
Please follow the instructions at https://docs.portworx.com/scheduler/mesosphere-dcos/framework_cleanup.html to remove any persistent state if required.
